name: @bitcoinerlab/coinselect
author: Jose-Luis Landabaso
description: A TypeScript library for Bitcoin transaction management, based on Bitcoin Descriptors for defining inputs and outputs. It facilitates optimal UTXO selection and transaction size calculation.

scripts.fixturesVsize: npm run ensureTester && npx ts-node --transpile-only --project ./node_modules/@bitcoinerlab/configs/tsconfig.test.json test/tools/vsize/fixturesFromRegtest.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:test
scripts.lint:
if [ "$ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG" != false ]; then echo '
⚠️  WARNING: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG is not set to "false".
   Editors may show different results than the CLI linter.
   To fix permanently, add this to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc:

   export ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false
'; fi; ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false eslint --ignore-path .gitignore --ext .ts src/ test/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && jest
